data.name: Fall Up
data.detailed_description:
Fall Up is 2.5D platformer where you use enemies to overcome obstacles.

Enemies are friends

Trick enemies into helping you. Manipulate, provoke, and even protect them to gain an advantage. To do this, you have to get close to them. Go towards the danger to succeed.

Powerful, precise movement

Use the mighty Leg Cannon to launch yourself like a cannonball. Ground Pound enemies to bounce back up with tremendous force. Dash like a ninja to quickly evade incoming danger. Run and Double Jump to move with fine control. In Fall Up, there are a variety of moves that you can use to express yourself.

Explore a vibrant world

39 lovingly crafted levels. 5 unique worlds to explore. Look for secrets, talk to charming characters, and piece together the history of this densely packed world.

A real story set in a cartoon world

Set in a bizarre world filled with giant fruits and incompetent robots is a real human tale about the feeling of emptiness in a world of excesses. Help our protagonist discover what really matters.

data.short_description: Fall Up is a tight, fast-paced 2.5D Platformer where you manipulate your enemies to overcome obstacles. Go on an epic adventure in this bizarre dystopian world filled with sentient fruits, warring bird clans, goofy robots and giant insects.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 Service Pack 1 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2125 / AMD A8-6600K
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 650 / Radeon HD 5770
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
